document_data.name: Durgo Silvermane
document_data.mainbody: '''Durgo Silvermane''' is the eldest son of [[Jhaele Silvermane]].
document_data.History: As of [[1375 DR]], Durgo has taken over most of the day to day administrative duties of running [[The Old Skull Inn]] from his mother, Jhaele. In addition to his duties as an innkeeper, Durgo farms the family farm.
